geographical_features: largest land area in the world; access to Arctic Ocean, Black Sea, Pacific; vast natural resources (oil, gas, minerals)
economic_strengths: energy sector (oil and gas), metals, defense industry, agriculture, resource exports
army_size: approx. 1 million active personnel (varies due to conscription and mobilization)
digitalization_level: moderate â€” developed in urban centers, less so in rural areas
political_economic_threats: international sanctions; dependence on hydrocarbon exports; demographic decline; economic isolation; internal unrest
military_threats: NATO presence, insurgency in some regions, border instability
development_milestones: major military power; vast natural resources; long-standing geopolitical ambitions; shifting economic orientation toward Asia
